content:
TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for Nordic Connect SDK Project
DESCRIPTION: Sets up the CMake build configuration for a Nordic Connect SDK project. Requires CMake 3.20.0 or higher and the Zephyr RTOS package. Configures the project name and adds main.c as the primary source file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.9.0-v2.7.0/l2/l2_e1/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for NRF Connect SDK
DESCRIPTION: Sets up the basic CMake configuration for building a Zephyr-based NRF Connect SDK project. Specifies the minimum CMake version, finds the Zephyr package, sets the project name, and adds the main source file to the build.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.9.0-v2.7.0/l7/l7_e1_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.1)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for NRF Connect SDK Project
DESCRIPTION: Configures CMake build system for a Zephyr-based NRF Connect SDK project. Sets minimum CMake version, finds Zephyr package, and specifies main source file for compilation. Includes Intel copyright notice and Apache 2.0 license reference.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.9.0-v2.7.0/l4/l4_e1/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
#
# Copyright (c) 2016 Intel Corporation
#
# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake for NRF Connect SDK Fundamentals Project
DESCRIPTION: This CMake script sets up the build configuration for an NRF Connect SDK Fundamentals project. It specifies the minimum CMake version, finds the Zephyr package, defines the project name, and adds the main source file to the build.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.6.2-v2.0.0/l7/l7_e2_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

```
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for NRF Connect SDK Project
DESCRIPTION: Configures the CMake build system for an NRF Connect SDK project. Sets minimum CMake version, finds Zephyr package, defines project name, and includes source files. Contains conditional inclusion of custom source files based on configuration flags.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.9.0-v2.7.0/l3/l3_e2_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})

project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
# STEP 3 - Include the custom files in the build
#target_sources(app PRIVATE src/myfunction.c)
# STEP 7 - Make the addition of custiom files conditional
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_MYFUNCTION app PRIVATE src/myfunction.c)
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.6.2-v2.0.0/l4/l4_e3/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

```
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Blinky Build and Flash Commands
DESCRIPTION: Command structure for building and flashing the Blinky application to a supported board using Zephyr's application commands.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l2/l2_e1_sol/README.rst#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: none
CODE:
```
:zephyr-app: samples/basic/blinky
:board: reel_board
:goals: build flash
:compact:
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake for nRF Connect SDK Fundamentals Project
DESCRIPTION: This CMake snippet sets up the build environment for an nRF Connect SDK Fundamentals project. It specifies the minimum CMake version, locates the Zephyr package, defines the project name, and adds source files to the build. It also includes a conditional compilation directive for an optional function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l3/l3_e2_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: CMake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})

project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_MYFUNCTION app PRIVATE src/myfunction.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for Nordic Connect SDK Project

SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v2.9.0-v2.7.0/l4/l4_e2_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

TITLE: Configuring CMake Build for Zephyr Blinky Project
DESCRIPTION: Sets up CMake build configuration for a Blinky project using Zephyr RTOS. Includes board-specific power management configuration and conditional compilation for Thingy:53 DFU support.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l6/l6_e2_sol/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)

set(PM_STATIC_YML_FILE
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boards/pm_static_${BOARD}.yml
  )

find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(blinky)

# Preinitialization related to Thingy:53 DFU
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_BOARD_THINGY53_NRF5340_CPUAPP app PRIVATE
  boards/thingy53.c
)
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_BOARD_THINGY53_NRF5340_CPUAPP_NS app PRIVATE
  boards/thingy53.c
)
target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring CMake for Blinky Project with Zephyr
DESCRIPTION: Sets up the CMake project for Blinky, including Zephyr package and source files. It also handles Thingy:53 specific configurations for DFU (Device Firmware Update).
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l6/l6_e2/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: CMake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)

set(PM_STATIC_YML_FILE
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boards/pm_static_${BOARD}.yml
  )

find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(blinky)

# Preinitialization related to Thingy:53 DFU
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_BOARD_THINGY53_NRF5340_CPUAPP app PRIVATE
  boards/thingy53.c
)
target_sources_ifdef(CONFIG_BOARD_THINGY53_NRF5340_CPUAPP_NS app PRIVATE
  boards/thingy53.c
)
target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

DESCRIPTION: This CMake configuration sets up a basic Zephyr RTOS project named 'nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals'. It requires CMake 3.13.1 or higher, finds the Zephyr package using the ZEPHYR_BASE environment variable, and adds src/main.c as the primary source file for the application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l7/l7_e2/CMakeLists.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: cmake
CODE:
```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.1)
find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(nrf_connect_sdk_fundamentals)

target_sources(app PRIVATE src/main.c)
```

TITLE: Configuring UART0 Baud Rate in Zephyr Device Tree
DESCRIPTION: Sets the baud rate (current-speed) of the UART0 peripheral to 9600 bps. This device tree fragment overrides the default configuration for the UART0 interface, which is commonly used for serial communication or console output in embedded systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l3/l3_e2_sol/nrf52833dk_nrf52833.overlay.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: devicetree
CODE:
```
&uart0 {
	current-speed = <9600>;
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Error message for unsupported board in Blinky sample
DESCRIPTION: This error message appears when attempting to build the Blinky sample for a board that doesn't have the required 'led0' devicetree alias defined. The error indicates that the board configuration is missing the necessary LED GPIO definition.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordicdeveloperacademy/ncs-fund/blob/main/v1.9.1-v1.6.0/l2/l2_e2_sol/README.rst#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: none
CODE:
```
Unsupported board: led0 devicetree alias is not defined
```
